full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN CES BYA BA'I 'GREL PA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): SLOB DPON SENG GE BZANG PO,
translator_(орчуулагч): BIDYA KA RA BRA BHA, DPAL BRTZEGS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @058B SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN CES BYA BA'I 'GREL PA, SLOB DPON SENG GE BZANG POS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO BIDYA KA RA BRA BHA DANG, ZHU CHEN LO TZTSA BA BAN DHE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,SLAD KYIS PAndI TA DPAL GO MI MCHI MED LA SOGS PA DANG LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYI LEGS PAR GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,` DRI MED THUB BSTAN GANGS RI MTHON PO'I SPOR, ,BSHAD SGRUB RAL PA STUG POS MNGON BRJID CING, ,LUNG RIGS MCHE SDER RNON PO'I DPAL 'CHANG BA, ,SMRA BA'I DBANG PHYUG SENG GE BZANG PO 'DUD, ,RGYAL YUM SHER PHYIN RANG BZHIN BZANG PO'I LUS, ,MDZES BYED DNGOS BRGYAD DON CHEN BDUN BCU'I PHRENG, ,MA 'DRES GSAL BAR STON PA'I ME LONG NI, ,BSTAN BCOS CHEN PO 'GREL PA DON GSAL TE, ,DE NYID CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I PHYIR, ,SHAR PHYOGS RGYAL KHAB CHEN PO'I 'DUS PA'I SDE, ,DGA' LDAN BYIN CHAGS GLING DU SPAR BSGRUB PA'I, ,RNAM DKAR DGE TSOGS PHUNG PO CI MCHIS PAS, ,RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO YI, ,@059A *, ,DRI MED RING LUGS PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU, ,BSHAD DANG BSGRUB PA'I SGO NAS 'PHEL BA DANG, ,'GRO KUN PHAN BDE'I DPAL LA SPYOD PAR SHOG ,'DIR 'BAD BDAG GZHAN SKYE BA THAMS CAD DU, ,RGYAL BA'I YUM DON THOS BSAM SGOMS GSUM GYIS, ,TSUL BZHIN NYAMS SU LEN PA MTHAR PHYIN NAS, ,MI PHAM MGON PO DE DANG MTSUNGS PAR SHOG ,CES BSTAN BCOS 'GREL PA DON GSAL 'DI NYID, ,DAR HAN GNANG SO DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN GTZOS, ,BKA' BCU DGE SLONG RTA MGRIN TSE BRTAN DANG, ,JA SAG TA'I CHING BSOD NAMS DON GRUB SOGS, ,MI CHE CHUNG DU MAS ZHAL 'DEBS BGYIS TE GA-YUNG HVA KUN DU SPAR DU SGRUB SKABS, ,SPAR BYANG 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES GONG SMOS RNAMS NAS BSKUL BA LTAR BTZUN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
